page.title: 13NATIONAL SERVICES
page.content:
The Scottish Fire Training School, which trains all firemen in Scotland, was opened in 1953 by Sir Vivien Henderson. Initial training of a fireman takes 16 weeks after which time he is considered operational. Intake per session is approx. 60,most of whom pass basic training.
The Scottish Development Department Bridging Depot covers 23 acres and has been in use since 1955.4 workers are employed to grit blast the rust off bridges before painting them.A bridge can take up to 2 years to repair.It is the only bridge depot in Scotland and therefore services a large land area.
